tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE seed_distribution (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  seed_name VARCHAR,
  farmer_id UUID,
  distribution_date DATE,
  crop_performance VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Distribution (
    distributor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    distributor_name VARCHAR(50),
    distributor_location VARCHAR(100),
    seed_type VARCHAR(50),
    distribution_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE CropPerformance (
    farmer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farmer_name VARCHAR(50),
    crop_type VARCHAR(50),
    crop_yield FLOAT,
    crop_health VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE CropPerformance (
 performance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 seed_id UUID REFERENCES Seeds(seed_id),
 farmer_id UUID REFERENCES Farmers(farmer_id),
 yield INT,
 quality_rating DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE farmers (
 farmer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 farmer_name VARCHAR(50),
 location VARCHAR(100),
 crop_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE seeds (
 seed_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 seed_name VARCHAR(50),
 seed_type VARCHAR(50),
 supplier VARCHAR(50),
 expiration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE distribution (
 distribution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 seed_id INT,
 farmer_id INT,
 distribution_date DATE,
 quantity INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (seed_id) REFERENCES seeds(seed_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (farmer_id) REFERENCES farmers(farmer_id)
)

CREATE TABLE crop_performance (
 performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 farmer_id INT,
 year INT,
 crop_yield INT,
 disease_resistance VARCHAR(50),
 FOREIGN KEY (farmer_id) REFERENCES farmers(farmer_id)
)

CREATE TABLE distribution (
    distribution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farmer_id INT,
    seed_id INT,
    distribution_date DATE,
    quantity INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (farmer_id) REFERENCES farmers(farmer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (seed_id) REFERENCES seeds(seed_id)
);

CREATE TABLE crop_performance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    distribution_id INT,
    crop_yield FLOAT,
    disease_occurrence BOOLEAN,
    harvest_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (distribution_id) REFERENCES distribution(distribution_id)
);

CREATE TABLE performance_notes (
    note_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    performance_id INT,
    note_text TEXT,
    note_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (performance_id) REFERENCES crop_performance(performance_id)
);
